Name: UdayShankar Ammanagi
Title: Engineering Leadership | Technical Program Management | OTT / Video Streaming | Backend Services Architecture & Implementation
Education: • Key Result Areas: • Led comprehensive project planning, including feasibility analysis, effort estimation, and risk mitigation, ensuring timely and scalable delivery of engineering initiatives. • Headed a SWE Team of 7 members for building and maintaining the Platform and Workflows used for onboarding all content onto Jio Hotstar. • Orchestrated prioritization, dependency management, and execution alignment across multiple cross-functional teams to maintain delivery momentum and reduce technical debt. • Partnered closely with Product Managers, QA, SRE, DevOps, and Business stakeholders to translate business objectives into actionable technical roadmaps and high-impact outcomes. • Applied data-driven leadership through rigorous tracking of OKRs, KPIs, SLAs, and RoI, driving performance optimization and delivery accountability. • Built and scaled high-performing engineering teams, owning the end-to-end hiring lifecycle, fostering talent through coaching, mentoring, and implementing structured growth plans. • Championed engineering best practices, ensuring adherence to quality standards, code reviews, CI/CD pipelines, and robust documentation protocols. • Practiced and promoted Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban), leading sprint planning, backlog grooming, retrospectives, and ceremonies to drive predictable and iterative delivery. • Successfully managed external vendors, contractors, and consultants, ensuring SLA compliance, cost-effectiveness, and seamless integration with internal engineering workflows. • Instituted risk management frameworks, proactively identifying technical, operational, and delivery risks with corresponding mitigation strategies. • Advocated for a culture of innovation, continuous improvement, and psychological safety within teams to unlock creativity and long-term retention. • Oversaw resource planning and budget allocation, optimizing team capacity and aligning spend with strategic priorities and business value. • Highlights: • Spearheaded the seamless migration of ~500K high-value media assets and metadata during the strategic merger of Jio Cinema and Disney Hotstar into Jio Hotstar, ensuring platform integrity and minimal operational disruption, also enabling a 2x growth in paid subscriber base from 52M to 100M and generate a revenue of ~3000 Cr INR in the following quarter. • Led the execution of AgenticAI based solution for empowering Ops. • This helped to automate 80%+ of operational reports. • The system empowered non-technical users and slashed the on-call query load for engineers by over 50%. • Led the design and delivery of the complete backend infrastructure for Disney+ launch in MENA, enabling seamless onboarding of the Disney library and supporting expansion into 12+ markets, driving a reach of 10–15M new consumers. • Spearheaded the design and implementation of real-time data streaming pipelines for premium Connected TV integrations (Samsung, Apple TV, Tata Play, Airtel), enhancing content syndication capabilities and unlocking access to a 10M+ user base. • Designed Just-in-Time Ads Encoding workflow for Ad Open Exchange integration, enabling new monetization avenues that helped to achieve the revenue target of 1800 Cr INR.
